person.persName: Thomas P. Hays (Ballard County, Kentucky, politician)

body.p: Ballard County, Kentucky, politician. Pennsylvania native. Married to Mary C. Hays. Father of Lou Eddy Hays. Member of the House of Representatives of the Commonwealth of Kentucky for Ballard County from 1863 to 1865. Member of the Union Party in 1863.
